How to add alpha transparency to a plane in unity. Short answer.

You can add alpha transparency to a plane in Unity by first creating a material, then setting its rendering mode to "Transparent". Next, you can assign the material to the plane object, and set the alpha value of the material to adjust the transparency level. Additionally, you may need to adjust the sorting order of the object in the scene to ensure that it displays in the correct order.
How can I make it two sided? Short answer

To make a plane two-sided in Unity, you can create a new material, set its rendering mode to "Transparent" and check the "Double Sided Global Illumination" checkbox. Then, assign this material to your plane object. This will allow you to see the object from both sides.

Hi Joe! We are Fabrizio and Juan Manuel from TOXI.Media Argentina. We are great fans of your work! We've been planningÂ a web series which it's inspired by your movie We Met in VR. It's about an ancient literature teacher who hates technologyÂ and gets trapped in a VR Agora. If he wants to get out, he must interviewÂ some experts who help him change his mind. We are sending you the pitch-deck if you are interested to see it. Also, we have some questions based on your experience working with VR. 1. How do you shoot in VR? Do you record using an external camera or isÂ it installedÂ inÂ the VR scenario? Tell us something about the plug in you invented for Oculus.Â Â 2. How do you record the sound in VR? Do you use some specificÂ tool for it? Or you just used an external microphone?3. Have you ever worked with mixed reality? UsingÂ some imagesÂ taken in VR and others from live action? Once again, thanks so much for your time! We think this could be the beginningÂ of a beautifulÂ friendship! Cheers, F y J   Can you make this letter cleaner? But still friendly. In English.

Subject: Exciting Web Series Opportunity Inspired by "We Met in VR"  Hi Joe,  Greetings from Argentina! We are Fabrizio and Juan Manuel from TOXI.Media, and we're big fans of your work. We're excited to share a new web series concept with you that's inspired by your film "We Met in VR." The series revolves around an ancient literature teacher who despises technology but finds himself trapped in a VR Agora. To escape, he must interview experts who help him see the value in technology.  We've attached a pitch deck if you're interested in learning more about the project.  Additionally, we have some questions about your experience with VR production:  1. How do you film in VR? Do you use an external camera, or is it integrated within the virtual environment? We'd love to know more about the plugin you developed for Oculus. 2. How do you capture sound in VR? Are there specific tools or microphones you use within the VR setting, or do you rely on external recording equipment? 3. Have you ever worked with mixed reality, blending live-action footage and VR imagery?  Thank you so much for your time! We hope this could be the start of a fantastic collaboration.  Best regards,  Fabrizio and Juan Manuel TOXI.Media Argentina
Replace those questions with questions regarding the film DISTRIBUTION, the HBO Deal and the festival circuit.

Subject: Exciting Web Series Opportunity Inspired by "We Met in VR"  Hi Joe,  Greetings from Argentina! We are Fabrizio and Juan Manuel from TOXI.Media, and we're big fans of your work. We're excited to share a new web series concept with you that's inspired by your film "We Met in VR." The series revolves around an ancient literature teacher who despises technology but finds himself trapped in a VR Agora. To escape, he must interview experts who help him see the value in technology.  We've attached a pitch deck if you're interested in learning more about the project.  Additionally, we would love to hear more about your experience with film distribution, specifically related to the following:  1. How did you navigate the film distribution process for "We Met in VR"? What were some key factors that contributed to its successful distribution? 2. Can you share insights on securing the HBO deal? What was the experience like working with them, and what advice would you give to budding creators looking to pitch their projects to networks like HBO? 3. How did your film fare in the festival circuit, and what strategies do you recommend for leveraging film festivals to garner attention and promote a film?  Thank you so much for your time! We hope this could be the start of a fantastic collaboration.  Best regards,  Fabrizio and Juan Manuel TOXI.Media Argentina

De hecho, beber alcohol en exceso, ya sea tequila o cualquier otra bebida alcohÃ³lica, puede tener efectos negativos en diversos aspectos de la salud.   El consumo excesivo y prolongado de alcohol puede aumentar el riesgo de sufrir problemas de salud, como enfermedades hepÃ¡ticas, enfermedades cardiovasculares, problemas neurolÃ³gicos, trastornos del sueÃ±o, problemas de memoria, depresiÃ³n y ansiedad. Por lo tanto, si bien se ha demostrado que el tequila puede tener ciertos beneficios para la salud en cantidades moderadas debido a los compuestos contenidos en la planta del agave y puede ser una bebida que se disfrute de manera responsable y en ocasiones especiales, es importante tener en cuenta que beber en exceso puede generar problemas en la salud y en la vida social de las personas.
